snippet: After late-night talks, French, German and Greek leaders asserted that Greece could get back on track by speeding up the implementation of a February agreement.

byline.original: By ANDREW HIGGINS and JAMES KANTER

lead_paragraph: After late-night talks, French, German and Greek leaders asserted that Greece could get back on track by speeding up the implementation of a February agreement.

headline.main: European Leaders Urge Greece to Accelerate Overhaul Efforts
headline.print_headline: European Leaders Urge Greece to Accelerate Overhaul Efforts
